entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Element gets duplicated after TableView is refreshed #14819
  • Regression in grid layouts in .NET 8 #14818
  • Remove error property from Obsolete attribute on Properties dictionary #14817
  • Control enabling/disabling style color not working (new in net7.0) #14813
  • Imagesource problem when page reload #14811
  • HE has not shown .net framework app develpoment #14808
  • .NET MAUI on Android keeps not responding messages #14806
  • SwipeView does not work on Android #14805
  • Localize the warning in the implicit package references #14804
  • Add infrastructure for NuGet references to know what versions of the SDK they support #14803
  • Shell ToolbarItems not shown in iOS App #14802
  • NullReferenceException in UpdateLeftBarButtonItem #14801
    Backlog
  • Padding not applied to AbsoluteLayout within ScrollView when navigating through app shell. #14797
  • MeasureFirstItem crash app on Android #14796
  • Gestures only work on the part where the map control is displayed on the screen when it is first displayed. [iOS] #14795
  • The Map Control Lags During Scrolling When Android BottomSheet is Opened #14794
  • Android: toolbar's text style for default theme has too low contrast (very unreadable) #14793
  • Multi Columns Grid Height wrong on iOS / Android #14792

Closed

  • Visual State for button background not working #14385
  • Unable to build for Windows on Windows #14810
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to change FontSize #11817
    Backlog
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to change FontFamily #12230
    Backlog
  • [iOS, Mac] Pan gesture not working while using clip #3800
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException when Resources/Images contains non-image #6166
    Backlog
  • AVCaptureSession.isMultitaskingCameraAccessEnabled Not exposed/accessible #14789
  • iOS Binding library crash DYLD 4 Symbol missing #13464
    Backlog
  • exception upon use of OnPlatform WinUI #9390
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS app is crashing while tap any key on keyboard #14621
  • PointerGestureRecognizer CommandParameter using ICommand as declaring Type instead of object #14629

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816
  • Add some dummy images to the sandbox #14815
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Make sure to call `InitializeViewHandler` when creating a handler #14814
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
  • [Android] Avoid OnDestroy lifecycle event firing twice #14799
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample to the Gallery to validate shape invalidations clipping #14798
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Transition away from implicit package references #14770
    area/setup 🪄
  • Use new methods for checking colors #14809
  • Correctly re-apply font formatting to HTML text #14701
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested

Updated

  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr6 ]Fix version for ems script manifest #14787
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻
  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
